snippet: Thursday’s highlights from around the Web include Twitter’s prospectus for its initial public offering. Plus, an alert from Adobe that the data for almost three million of its customers may have been compromised.
abstract: Thursday’s highlights from around the Web include Twitter’s prospectus for its initial public offering. Plus, an alert from Adobe that the data for almost three million of its customers may have been compromised.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Twitter's I.P.O. Filing, and Adobe Hacked
